page.title: 16NON FACTORY EMPLOYMENT
page.content: There are very few jobs in Fleckney which do not involve a factory. Those who do not wish to work in a factory have very little choice within the village.Those jobs available include working for the school either as a dinner helper or kitchen worker.the others are as follows:- public houses(2) Post Office (1), Library(1) Food Shops(4) Hairdressers(2) Hardware(1) Cobblers(1) Bookshop(1) Boutique(1) Wool Shop(1) Garages(3) Bank(1) Building Society(1) Butchers(2) Social Clubs(2) Newsagent(1) Bread Shop and small cafe(1)
